entries.name: Restore
entries.description:
Effect: Remove Exhausted or Frightened Condition from [DICE] + 1 creatures

Recharge: Bury in a peaceful field or riverbank for three days.

entries.name: Invisibility
entries.description:
Effect: Make creature invisible for [DICE] Turns. Any movement reduces duration by 1 Turn.

Recharge: Go a day without opening your eyes once, while holding the spell.

entries.name: Catnip
entries.description:
Effect: Turn object into an irresistible lure for cats. Lasts [DICE] Turns.

Recharge: Give a cat a gift it truly desires.

entries.name: Heal
entries.description:
Effect: Heal [SUM] STR damage and remove the Injured Condition from a creature.

Recharge: Cut self for [[/r d6]] STR damage, sprinkle the spell with the blood.

entries.name: Grow
entries.description:
Effect: Grow a creature to [DICE] + 1 times its original size for 1 Turn.

Recharge: Leave in the highest branches of a tall tree for three days.

entries.name: Darkness
entries.description:
Effect: Create a [SUM] x 2" diameter sphere of pure darkness for [DICE] Turns.

Recharge: Leave uncovered in a lightless place for three days.

entries.name: Fireball
entries.description:
Effect: Shoot a fireball up to 24". Deal [SUM] + [DICE] damage to all creatures within 6".

Recharge: Burn in the heart of a raging fire for three days and nights.

entries.name: Ghost Beetle
entries.description:
Effect: Create an illusory beetle that can carry 6 inventory slots for [DICE] x 6 Turns.

Recharge: Bury in a beetle graveyard for three nights.

entries.name: Knock
entries.description:
Effect: Open a door or container, as if a Save were made with STR score of 10 + [DICE] x 4.

Recharge: Put in a locked box, inside a locked box, inside a locked box. Leave for three days.

entries.name: Invisible Ring
entries.description:
Effect: Creates [DICE] x 6" ring of force. It is invisible and immovable. Lasts [DICE] Turns.

Recharge: Build an iron ring the same size as last cast. Pass the spell though it. Dissolves the ring.

entries.name: Magic Missile
entries.description:
Effect: Deal [SUM] + [DICE] damage to a creature within sight.

Recharge: Drop from a height of at least 30ft. Touch the spell within one Turn.

entries.name: Light
entries.description:
Effect: Force [DICE] creatures to make a WIL save or become stunned. Alternately, create light as bright as a torch for [SUM] turns.

Recharge: Catch in the first light of a sunrise and the last light of sunset for three days.

entries.name: Be Understood
entries.description:
Effect: Make your meaning clear to [DICE] creatures of another species for [DICE] Turns.

Recharge: Give away freely to a creature of another species.

entries.name: Fear
entries.description:
Effect: Give the Frightened Condition to [DICE] creatures.

Recharge: Receive the Frightened Condition from a hostile creature while carrying the spell.

entries.name: Grease
entries.description:
Effect: Cover [DICE] x 6" area in slippery, flam- mable grease. Creatures in the area must make a DEX save or fall prone.

Recharge: Rub all over in animal fat. Leave until it putrefies.
